module.name: product_class
module.keywords: module, product class, specification, specification category, Boolean specification expression
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the identification and characterization of families of similar product to be offered to the market.

inscope.li: identification, as a product class, of a set of similar products to be offerred to the market;
identification of categories of specifications that may be used to characterize the members of a product-class;
representation of Boolean expressions of specifications;
representation of dependency rules between specifications;
association of specification categories, of specifications, of specification expressions and of specification dependency rules with a product-class.

outscope.li: identification of the parts to be used in the members of a product class;
identification of process-plans to be used to manufacture, assemble or control the members of a product class.
